webscript.description: Export direct and group-based permissions for a site or all sites as XLSX. Supports filtering by user status, from date, and username search. If no site is specified, exports permissions for all sites.

arg.description: Site short name (optional - if not specified, exports permissions for all sites)
Filter by user status: All, Active, Inactive (optional)
Filter by permission grant date from (yyyy-MM-dd format, optional)
Search by username or email (partial match, optional)
